name: Spartina Artisan Wool Scarves - Green Ikat, Zig Zag, Navy Chevron & Fusion Artisan
description:
Spartina’s new artisan scarf is the ultimate in luxury. Textures, colors, and patterns combine in artistic arrangements to create a fashion accessory that wraps you in glamorous style. Crafted in super-soft, lightweight Australian wool, this over-sized artisan scarf is top of the line, and an elegant addition to any wardrobe.

-Light-weight Australian wool
-84"x25"

Available in Green Ikat (Olive Green, Light Blue, Reg, Gold, Turquoise Ikat), Zig Zag (Black, Grey, Tan, White, Red), Navy Chevron (navy, white, gold chevron), Fusion Artisan (Paisley Terracotta, Turquoise, Gold, Cream)

name: Spicy Apple Round Botanical Candle by Rosy Rings
description:
Spicy Apple Round Botanical Candle by Rosy Rings

Our best selling candle every year! The classic combination of apple slices, cinnamon and bay leaves is our all-time best seller. The fragrance is crisp red delicious apple, freshly ground cinnamon and clove. It’s tempting to eat the wax. Please don’t. 

5" diameter x 6.5" tall, 200 hour burn time

description:

name: Spartina Carry-All Tote in Yemassee Trail, Pender & Chaplin's Landing
description:
So versatile, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it! Featuring a handsome accent strip of Spartina's fabulous Nubuck leather, this tote is refined enough for the office and sporty enough for a weekend outing. It's big enough for your laptop and all your office or travel essentials, but doesn't have the bulk of a heavy tote. The zippered top adds a layer of security and a touch of Spartina style. Genuine leather trim frames this fabulous, functional and fashionable favorite.

-Signature linen & nubuck leather accents
-Top zip closure
-Exterior zip pocket
-Linen interior lining
-2 interior open pockets
-Interior zipper pocket
-Height: 12”
-Depth: 5.5”
-Width: 16”

Available in Yemassee Trail (Olive Green, Brown & Cream), Pender (Black & Cream), Chaplain's Landing (Navy & Green)

Small Art Prints by Sugarboo Designs

Your Day: Your Day Will Go The Corners of Your Mouth

description:
Nora Fleming Mini's - Summer

Choose from Blue Beach Chair, Watermelon, Starfish, Crab and Woody Wagon. Each mini is sold separately.

For use with any Nora Fleming serving pieces. Serving pieces not included with mini. Shown in photos for reference only.

All Nora Fleming minis are hand-painted with care and concern for every detail. Hand wash with soapy water after use.

Call the store at 703-988-0944 to order any additional mini's not offered online.

name: Brigitte Candela by Tocca
description:
Brigitte Candela by Tocca 

The spiciness of ginger combined with the sweetness of rhubarb and papaya evoke the sultriness and charm of screen siren Brigitte Bardot. This 10.6 oz candle burns for approximately 60 hours.

name: Spartina Wrist Wallet In Pender, Chaplin's Landing, Yemassee Trail & Maggioni
description:
Larger than a standard wallet, features include surround zipper, wristlet strap, outside pocket, pen holder, inside zipper pocket, I.D. pocket and 15 card slots. The Spartina Mermaid charm is included on the signature linen exterior. Wallet is trimmed with leather.

-Signature linen with leather accents
-Gold tone mermaid logo medallion
-Removable wristlet
-Exterior zip pocket and exterior snap pocket
-Polyester interior lining
-16 card slots
-2 bill pockets and I.D. window
-Interior zip pocket and pen holder
-Height: 5”
-Depth: 1”
-Width: 8”

Available in Pender (Black & Cream w/ Cream Inside), Chaplain's Landing (Navy & Green w/ Navy Inside), Yemassee Trail (Olive Green, Brown & Cream w/ Cream Inside), Maggioni (Aubergine & Burnt Siena w/ Burnt Siena inside)

name: Wander Shea Butter Hand Creme by Lollia
description:
Wander Shea Butter Hand Creme by Lollia

Fragrance Description:

A floral escape for the romantic dreamer. Night blooming Jasmine and ancient Cypress adrift on moonlit paths of Water Lily and delicate, dew drenched greens.

Key ingredients:

Botanically lush handcreme with rich ingredients. Macadamia Nut & Avocado oils are blended to comfort & soothe skin. Beneficial hydrating extracts of Aloe & Shea Butter lightly moisturize. Formulated to absorb quickly and leave skin deliciously fresh.

Design Details:

Deep Indigo with a golden thread woven among Midnight Blossoms. The captivating sleeve encloses a reusable deep indigo box.

7"l x 2.25"h / 4.0 ounces

name: Vanilla Bourbon Mandarin 100ml Fragrance Diffuser by Antica Farmacista
description:
Vanilla Bourbon Mandarin 100ml Fragrance Diffuser by Antica Farmacista

A delightful twist on a Vanilla-based fragrance. The sweet richness of warm Vanilla is paired with Mandarin of Sicily, a crisp full-bodied citrus fragrance. Rounding out this warm blend is the spicy essence of Bourbon. These combined elements result in something very unexpected and wonderful. Includes reeds.

100ml

description:
Stay organized with the Zip Phone Wallet! This accessory doubles as a chic wallet and safe storage place for your smartphone. The interior is equipped with a center zip divider and plenty of card slots. Removable wristlet strap makes it convenient to use on the go.

description:
Kick it up a notch with our new sophisticated iPad case! This cover mixes a protective design of comolded built-in stand, with a contemporary, eye-catching look. For optimum comfort, this case offers two viewing positions including a lower angle which ideal for on screen typing. The form fitted design securely holds the iPad in place while the soft interior lining adds color and protects the device against scratches. This cover fits the iPad 2 & 3.

-Suede interior lining

The surprise is that the flap doubles as a deep pocket sleeve that extends the length of the bag. Rich details include decorative leather appointments including buckles and gold pegs that add an exquisite finishing touch.

name: Morrocan Amber Reed Diffuser by NEST Fragrances
description:
Morrocan Amber Reed Diffuser by NEST Fragrances

Moroccan amber, sweet patchouli, heliotrope and bergamot are accented with a hint of eucalyptus.﻿

Our elegant Reed Diffusers are carefully crafted with the highest quality fragrance oils and are designed to continuously fill any space with a lush, memorable fragrance. The alcohol-free formula releases fragrance slowly and evenly into the air for approximately 90 days.

Net Weight: 5.9 Fl. Oz. (175 mL)

name: Table Topics Conversation Cubes - Original, Family, Not Your Mother's Dinner Party
description:
Table Topics Conversation Cubes - Original, Family, Not Your Mother's Dinner Party

Engaging, fun, entertaining, and stylish, TableTopics conversation starter sets fit into any home decor, and are perfect for use every day. Each edition has a unique set of questions created to stimulate great conversations among family, friends, and acquaintances. Choose from the following three categories:

Original - The cube that started it all! These engaging questions inspire the best kinds of conversation.

Family - One of the most important things we can do with our children is connect over a family meal. This fun mix of age-appropriate questions ranges from silly to thought-provoking and provides an easy, fun way to get families talking.

Not Your Mother's Dinner Party - There's the dinner party that your mom would throw, and then there's YOUR kind of dinner party. These provocative questions are guaranteed to get your party started with conversations as spicy as the food you serve.

name: Angel Dear Blankies
description:
Angel Dear Blankies are sweet, charming characters, machine-washable and cashmere-soft. 13”x13" with just the right simple details to soothe and delight. 

Choose from Tan Giraffe, Pink Flower Bunny, Pink Kitty, Brown Owl and Dark Monkey.

Arrives, rolled up on sides and tied with a ribbon.

name: Relax Shea Butter Handcreme by Lollia
description:
Relax Shea Butter Handcreme by Lollia

Fragrance Description:
A rich exotic blend of Lavender, Bee Blossom Honey with White Orchids and warm, woody undertones of Indian Amber delicately completed with a touch of Tahitian Vanilla.

Fresh floral infusions of Violet and Lavender impart a whisper of delicate fragrance. Innocently seductive, let this be the last "accessory" you slip on before an evening on the town. A classic, silken formula leaves skin petal-soft with Shea Butter and Macadamia Nut Oils.

Key ingredients:
White Orchid, Tahitian Vanilla, Bee Blossom Honey and Indian Amber. Shea Butter and Macadamia Nut Oil.

Design Details:
Sophisticated vintage French inspired floral pattern combined with contemporary stripe ticking. Outer sleeve wraps over reusable box covered in monochromatic flowers and vines.

7"l x 2.25"h / 4.0 ounces

name: Wasabi Pear Reed Diffuser by NEST Fragrances
description:
Wasabi Pear Reed Diffuser by NEST Fragrances

Anjou pear and fresh, ozonic watery notes are infused with the essence of wasabi.

Our elegant Reed Diffusers are carefully crafted with the highest quality fragrance oils and are designed to continuously fill any space with a lush, memorable fragrance. The alcohol-free formula releases fragrance slowly and evenly into the air for approximately 90 days.

Net Weight: 5.9 Fl. Oz. (175 mL)﻿﻿

description:
Volcano Candle by Capri Blue

Burn Time: 85+ Hours

100 hour burn time

name: Canvas Storage Bins from 3 Sprouts
description:
Canvas Storage Bins from 3 Sprouts

Help your kids clean up their act with these cute animal storage bins. Well sized for storing toys, books or laundry our storage bin measures 17.5" in height and 17" in diameter. Made of a heavy cotton canvas this bin is tough enough to hold whatever you throw in it but cute enough to complement the best dressed home. A great space saver the bin folds easily away when not in use. The 3 Sprouts storage bin is a perfect gift for babies, toddlers and kids. 

Choose from: Brown Owl, Black Zebra, Purple Hippo, Pink Elephant, Blue Elephant

Dimensions: 17.5” Height x 17” Diameter

100% cotton canvas

100% eco-spun felt applique (made from recycled plastic bottles!)

Spot Clean

Naia Candle

description:

Johnny: Six pairs of bright high-top tennis shoe baby socks in a gift box. 

Skater Johnny: Six pairs of bright low-top checkered shoe socks in a gift box.

Johnny Golf: Six pairs of bright classic golf shoe baby socks in a gift box.

All collections are size 0-12 months.

name: Teroforma Whisky Stones
description:
Teroforma Whisky Stones

Ideal for chilling your favorite spirit without diluting its flavor. 
Milled in Vermont by the oldest soapstone workshop in the US. Add three chilled stones to your next dram, let stand for 5-minute and enjoy. 
Set of 9 stones and muslin storage bag. 
Not for use with larger volume drinks. 

Set of 9 stones and storage pouch 
Natural soapstone 
Chill whisky and spirits without diluting 
Freeze for 4-hour before using 

3/4 - 7/8-inch, Natural, Set of 9. 
6x4x1 (box)

name: Grace Candella by Tocca
description:
Grace Candella by Tocca

The pure essence of the Casablanca Lily, the Roman symbol of hope, is personified by the classic elegance of Grace Kelly. An exhilaratingly fresh scent from the fragrant blossom of the queen of flowers. This 10.6 oz candle burns for approximately 60 hours.

name: Bergamot & Ocean Aria 100ml Fragrance Diffuser by Antica Farmacista
description:
Bergamot & Ocean Aria 100ml Fragrance Diffuser by Antica Farmacista

A beautiful fragrance built on the allure of the ocean and its captivating ambiance. Fresh ozonic saltwater notes blend with soft jasmine and lavender while crisp bergamot adds a glistening effervescence. Soft warm notes of white musk and lush oakmoss complete this captivating scent. Includes reeds.

100ml

name: Nora Fleming Pearl Rim Egg or Appetizer Tray
description:
Nora Fleming Pearl Rim Egg or Appetizer Tray

Traditional and Elegant. Don't sell the egg/appetizer tray short...holds anything from cake pops, to one-bite appetizers, and yes...even deviled eggs! 

Measurements: 12" x 5"

** Mini's sold separately. (Images of platters with mini's are included for reference only. Not included with platter)

Microwave and dishwasher safe. 

How it works when purchased with or used with a "mini" adornment: 
Step 1: Dab the hole of your platter with water. 
Step 2: Insert the decorative mini of your choice. 
Step 3: Pull the stem down from the bottom so that the mini sits flush on the rim. 

VOILA! Now you can use one platter for EVERY occasion. Nora Fleming is constantly coming out with new platters and minis which makes Nora Fleming the perfect gift that keeps on giving! Start your collection today.

name: Nora Fleming Pearl Rim Garnish Dish
description:
Round Nora Fleming Pearl Rim Garnish Dish

Traditional and Elegant. Fill it with olives, limes, and lemon twists for a cocktail party, or with ketchup, mustard and relish for a bbq. 

** Mini's sold separately. (Images of platters with mini's are included for reference only. Not included with platter)

Measurements - 15 x 7 x 2.25"

Microwave and dishwasher safe. 

How it works when purchased with or used with a "mini" adornment: 
Step 1: Dab the hole of your platter with water. 
Step 2: Insert the decorative mini of your choice. 
Step 3: Pull the stem down from the bottom so that the mini sits flush on the rim. 

VOILA! Now you can use one platter for EVERY occasion. Nora Fleming is constantly coming out with new platters and minis which makes Nora Fleming the perfect gift that keeps on giving! Start your collection today.

name: Storage Caddy by 3 Sprouts
description:
Storage Caddy by 3 Sprouts

The 3 Sprouts caddy is the perfect organizational solution for any nursery. Made of canvas and ecospun felt (recycled plastic bottles) this caddy is the perfect tote for all of those nursery items from diapers to lotions, you need in one spot and ready to go.  And when Mum and Dad are finished with it, the 3 Sprouts caddy makes a perfect art tote for one’s little Picasso. Now that’s recycling!  

Choose from Mouse, Owl or Pig.

Dimensions: 15” Width x 8.5” Height x 5.5" Depth

Materials:
100% cotton canvas
100% eco-spun felt applique (made from recycled plastic bottles!)
100% polyester lining

Care instructions: 
exterior - spot clean only
interior - fully lined on the inside, each caddy easily wipes clean using a damp sponge

name: Ribbon Box Tea Sampler by Tea Forte
description:
Ribbon Box Tea Sampler by Tea Forte

The most popular way to buy Tea Forté, the Ribbon Box is the perfect amount of tea to be a great value for entertaining and for personal enjoyment. Wrapped in an elegant box with a satin ribbon. Available in a variety of tea assortments or in a single flavor boxes of a favorite blend. Contains 20 silken infusers.

2 pyramid infusers of each: Earl Grey, Black Currant, White Ambrosia, White Ginger Pear, Green Mango Peach, Jasmine Green, African Solstice, Chamomile Citron, Raspberry Nectar, Ginger Lemongrass.

description:
